snippet.textDisplay: Ys + Castlevania
snippet.textOriginal: Ys + Castlevania

snippet.textDisplay: The non-vocal is really god-like, almost like it as much as Astarte and Sacred Saber (those were heavier songs, especially MK2's), but it definetly is up there as the most epic sounding. The story was also probably the best one, the plot twist sort of reminded me of like the better Star Ocean/Tales of games, very original though since it has to do with alchemy specifically, and the setting is kind of like Harry Potter with an alchemy school instead of witchcraft school (best way I can describe it without spoilers). In other words, REALLY GOOD.
snippet.textOriginal: The non-vocal is really god-like, almost like it as much as Astarte and Sacred Saber (those were heavier songs, especially MK2's), but it definetly is up there as the most epic sounding. The story was also probably the best one, the plot twist sort of reminded me of like the better Star Ocean/Tales of games, very original though since it has to do with alchemy specifically, and the setting is kind of like Harry Potter with an alchemy school instead of witchcraft school (best way I can describe it without spoilers). In other words, REALLY GOOD.

snippet.textDisplay:
It's awesome as hell. Fun as hell to play, real easy to get into.

Story really plays like a highschool anime; there's a main story, but there's so many character specific sidestories (serious and non-serious) that you won't get bored by "a dull story"

Battlesystem is awesome. Unique characters so that you have to put some thought into what's happening, tag mechanics, and just some unique mechanics.

Overall, it's an awesome game imo. I'd recommend you atleast try it.
snippet.textOriginal:
It's awesome as hell. Fun as hell to play, real easy to get into.

Story really plays like a highschool anime; there's a main story, but there's so many character specific sidestories (serious and non-serious) that you won't get bored by "a dull story"

Battlesystem is awesome. Unique characters so that you have to put some thought into what's happening, tag mechanics, and just some unique mechanics.

Overall, it's an awesome game imo. I'd recommend you atleast try it.
